plusOneEligable.intro: We cordially invite you to celebrate our wedding with us on 01.06.2024.
plusOneEligable.intro2: The celebration will take place starting at 5:00 PM at Cantine Royale, Mercedesstraße 3, 70372 Stuttgart.
plusOneEligable.intro3: Please let us know by 30.03.2024 if you are coming.

third.errorMessage: Please provide the name of your plus one.

hotel.intro: B&B Hotel in Stuttgart Bad Cannstatt (directly opposite the wedding venue)
hotel.intro2: The hotel rooms can be requested via the following email:
hotel.intro3: With the keyword “Vintage Locations,” you will receive 10% discount on the daily room rate.

kinder.title: Children
kinder.text:
Unfortunately, our venue is not child-friendly due to its size and hazards (busy street, steep stairs, etc.). Therefore, we would appreciate a party “among us adults” and exceptionally without children. If this is not possible due to a lack of childcare, please let us know briefly.

Thank you very much for your understanding!

presents.title: If you would like to give us a present, we would appreciate financial contributions for our honeymoon.
presents.text: We would be even more delighted if the financial contributions reached us digitally rather than in cash.
